history.proof: hauto use: rem_diag, Nat.mul_1_l, Zp_invertible_prime, nat2Zp_inj, rem_lt, nat2Zp_p unfold: lt inv: le.

original: intros. intros [Hn1 Hn2]. unfold Zp_invertible. intros [H1 H2]. unfold Zp_invertible in H2. unfold prime in Hn2. destruct Hn2 as [H2' H3]. unfold prime in H1. destruct H1 as [H1' H1'']. apply nat2Zp_invertible. apply H1'. apply conj. * unfold lt in Hn1. apply Hn1. * specialize (nat2Zp_invertible n). intros H4. apply H4. apply conj. -- apply Z2Zp_of_nat. apply Hp'. * apply conj. ++ apply Hp'. ++ intro contra. apply H2'. apply contra. * apply H2.
